index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an amendment of Comprehensive Planning Assistance Grant Contract Number CPA-WA-10-00-0007 to extend the termination date thereof and increase the financial assistance provided the City by the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development, and in connection therewith making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
